ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Family coming together
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought my family was the only ones to do this!  LOL! I play with my husband and brother-in-law.  once in a while my 11yo daughter will play too.  we all
ygData.messageBody:
I thought my family was the only ones to do this!  LOL! I play with my husband and brother-in-law.  once in a while my 11yo daughter will play too.  we all share maps and info that we get too.  Usually we group together.  I really enjoy playing EQ with them, because we can spend time together and have fun!  LOL!!
 
Sidany
9th season druid
(finally, 8 was sooo long)
 
----- Original Message -----
From: kwarden@...
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 18, 2001 10:59 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Family coming together

I have been playing EQ for about 2 months now and have been telling
my sister all about the game. She has recently got a computer and
bought EQ. So now we have started playing together. This is the first
thing we have had in common in 20 years. A little weird to be killing
orcs with your sister but cool. Respond if you like not looking for
any though.






Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
